stepsDetails.stepTitle: How to find the Site ID
stepsDetails.details1: Generate Key: Log into your account on the API provider’s website. Navigate to the API section, and look for an option to generate or manage your API keys. Look for sections like 'Getting Started', 'Tutorials', or 'Developer Guide'.
stepsDetails.details2: Account Dashboard: Go to your account dashboard or developer portal. There should be a section dedicated to API keys where you can view or generate new keys.
stepsDetails.details3: Email Notifications: Some API providers send your API key via email when you first sign up or request a key. Check your inbox and spam folder for any such emails.

form.instruction: Generate your API key in the developer or API section of your account dashboard. Ensure to store it securely for future use.
form.label: Site ID
form.title: Enter the Site ID

stepsDetails.details1: Account Settings: Go to the account settings. The Shipment ID is usually listed there for billing and identification purposes.
stepsDetails.details2: Welcome Emails: When you sign up for a service, you often receive a welcome email that includes your account details, including the Shipment ID.
stepsDetails.details3: Contact Support: If all else fails, contact the provider’s support team or your own IT manager and they can help you find your Shipment ID.

form.instruction: Log into your provider account and navigate to the account or profile section. Your Shipment ID should be listed there.
form.label: Password
form.title: Enter your password

stepsDetails.details1: Account Settings: Go to the account settings. The Shipment ID is usually listed there for billing and identification purposes.
stepsDetails.details2: Welcome Emails: When you sign up for a service, you often receive a welcome email that includes your account details, including the Shipment ID.
stepsDetails.details3: Contact Support: If all else fails, contact the provider’s support team or your own IT manager and they can help you find your Shipment ID.

form.instruction: Log into your provider account and navigate to the account or profile section. Your Shipment ID should be listed there.
form.label: Shipment ID
form.title: Enter your Shipment ID
